商品名稱: Kistore 女款 夏季 休閒 V 領 背心 蓋袖 寬鬆版型 襯衫 長版上衣 襯衫

It's not a dealbreaker for me, I can still dress it up a little for work, but because of the material, I think it will fade and pill after wearing and washing it awhile.  It does fit true to size and the quality seems fine.

商品名稱: Kistore 女款 夏季 休閒 V 領 背心 蓋袖 寬鬆版型 襯衫 長版上衣 襯衫

商品名稱: Kistore 女款 夏季 休閒 V 領 背心 蓋袖 寬鬆版型 襯衫 長版上衣 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: A - 紫色 紅色尺寸: Large
留言內容: Over all, this is a decent blouse/shirt. The fit around the chest is not my favorite, it pulls and creates a crease due to how it is cut. I believe it is better suited to smaller chested ladies. The blouse is comfortable and soft and does fit in the size Large I got. For reference, I wear a size 10/12 usually, or size Medium US size, weigh 175-lbs give or take a few, have a 36C chest and size 32-34" waist.The connector on the front is not great, I can't get it to connect flat and it feels like it gaps a bit at the hole instead of laying against me smoothly. The length is good as is the fabric and stitching quality. Truth is, I am not likely to wear this other than around the house because of the front clip and the way it creases at the chest to shoulder area, I have much more attractive options. I am struggling with how to rate this since I don't like it and I suppose it could just be my body type, so I removed one star for the clip at the neckline. On my body, I feel it is a 3-star, though.

留言內容: good quality and comfortable for summer days! The loose fit and cap sleeves make them perfect for staying cool on hot days, and the v-neck adds a touch of elegance to the design.One of the things that I love most about these tops is the quality of the materials used. The fabric is soft and breathable, which means that it won't irritate your skin or cause discomfort during hot and humid days. I believe that investing in high-quality clothing is always worth it, and these tops are definitely a great choice.Another great feature of these tops is versatility. They can be dressed up or down, depending on the occasion. You can effortlessly pair them with shorts, jeans, skirts, or leggings to create a range of beautiful outfits. That gives you more flexibility in terms of styling options.Overall, the Kistore Women's Summer Casual V Neck Tank Tops are a must-have item for anyone who wants to stay comfortable and stylish during the summer months. The quality and the comfort of the tops will make them a go-to item in your wardrobe for years to come!

商品名稱: Kistore 女款 夏季 休閒 V 領 背心 蓋袖 寬鬆版型 襯衫 長版上衣 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: B-白色綠葉印花尺寸: Large
留言內容: I really really like the design on this top. It reminds me of very pretty stained glass and just gives off summer vibes to me. The material is soft and stretchy. It's not very light weight, but not heavy either - very comfortable. The cap sleeves are just right - I'm pretty sure this would pass in my office. The little clasp detail is cute, but I'll probably wear it open. It didn't really want to stay closed... I couldn't get it to click or anything. Not a biggie to me at all.As for fit, I'm between sizes... I like XL for a looser fit or large for maybe a more fitted looser fit, if that makes sense. It seemed to me like this top would have a more generous cut, so I took a chance and ordered the large and I'm so glad I did that. It's fit me perfectly - just the right amount of loose but somewhat fitted that I like for the summer.

留言內容: is t-shirt is a solid five-star find! Its comfortable fit and stylish look make it a standout piece in my wardrobe. The elegant cap sleeves and loose fitting design provide a flattering silhouette, while the unique metal clasp adds a touch of versatility. You can hook it for a chic round neck with a keyhole or unhook it for a more relaxed v-neck look, perfect for transitioning from day to night. It pairs beautifully with anything from high-waist skirts to casual jeans, making it incredibly easy to dress up or down. Whether it's for a casual outing or a semi-formal event, this t-shirt has become my go-to for its comfort and style.

留言內容:
無法載入媒體。
                



I am a solid ladies US L or XL on top (38B) and a 14/16 on bottom, standing 5’9”. When I order tops from Amazon, I usually get XL or XXL. For this, I got the XL and it fits just fine!The fabric is a soft rayon/poly/spandex mix. It is smooth the touch and the print is just on one side with the fabric being plain underneath. It definitely has a more polished look to it versus a T-shirt! The clasp at the neck is a gold tone. That’s not my favorite, as I’d prefer it to be silver or nonexistent, but it is not very noticeable due to the fun print.I think this shirt has many applications. It could be worn with jeans as a more casual look, or even under a suit blazer for a more polished look. Throw it on with a skirt and a jean jacket and it’s ready to roll. I would definitely consider ordering this in other colors!
